0.1.name: wordpress/fanbridge-toolbox
0.1.description:
The FanBridge Toolbox plugin allows you to add an email signup form to your Wordpress blog. The form automatically adds signups to your FanBridge account. Additionally you can add an events widget to show your upcoming events and a Fan Questions widget to allow your subscribers to ask you questions directly from within your Wordpress.

Not using FanBridge? Learn more about how FanBridge helps you grow, engage, and monetize your fan base.

After installing the FanBridge Toolbox plugin, you'll be able to login to your FanBridge account. After logging in you will get the list of the widgets that you have created at FanBridge and choose which one you want to add to your blog. You will also be able to customize your signup form. Setup takes less than 5 minutes and doesn't require any file editing. Download, customiz
